titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University of Pittsburgh Assorted Research Papers, 1961-1996 UA.90.08.22-T
titlestmt.author: Marianne Kasica.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:35:04 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh Assorted Research Papers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Pittsburgh. Department of History

did.abstract: This is a collection of research papers sumitted by University students or faculty.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Deposited by the Department of History, University of Pittsburgh.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Photocopying or other reproduction of papers is not allowed except for those papers which have a permisssion form signed by the auther allowing researchers to make copies. The authors who have donated their papers to the Archives Service Center will have that permission governed by the donation agreement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Pittsburgh Assorted Research Papers, UA.90.08.22-T, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: University of Pittsburgh Assorted Research Papers, UA.90.22.T, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh
Miscellaneous Manuscripts, Mms 30, University of Pittsburgh, Archives Service Center.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives of Industrial Society Assorted Research Papers, 1929-2009, AIS.Research.Papers, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of student and faculty research papers that were submitted in class or for conferences that have been collected by the Department of History, University of Pittsburgh.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by _ and Marianne Kasica in January 2014.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The History Department of the Universitiy of Pittsburgh has collected, over a number of years, worthy research papers from their classes and from other local scholars that specifically dealt with the history of Pittsburgh and Western Pennsylvania. These papers were classed in a general Miscellaneous Manuscript Collection. In 2013 the collection was separated into papers who were authored by University students and faculty and those that were authored by other scholars. The latter are in the collection called: Archives of Industrial Society (AIS) Assorted Research Papers.
